author: mrglavas
msg: JIRA Issue #85: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XMLCOMMONS-85. StAX 1.2 API updates. Add newFactory() and newFactory(String,ClassLoader) methods to XML*Factory classes. Deprecate newInstance(String,ClassLoader) methods in XML*Factory classes.

author: chirino
msg: Support pluggable connector and virtual host implementations.  Drop the pluggable router implementation support since that's just a implementation detail of the pluggable virtual host.

msg: Update to released version of scalate
